hotel_object.description: This hotel is located in the historical neighbourhood of Plaka, in the captivating city of Athens. It is just a few minutes' walking distance from the Acropolis, offering guests the ideal setting from which to explore the rich history and culture of the city. A host of shopping opportunities, dining options and entertainment venues are to be found nearby. Syntagma underground station is located just a short distance away while the airport is about 30 km away. This hotel enjoys a charming architectural design, blending beautifully with its culturally-rich, city surroundings. The guest rooms are elegantly appointed and are well equipped with modern amenities for a pleasant stay. The hotel features a range of first-class facilities, offering the utmost in comfort and convenience.

Wyndham Grand Athens hotel welcomes you, fully renovated, to a new haven of affordable luxury in the center of Athens. Conveniently located right next to the Metaxourgeio Metro station it offers the ideal starting point to explore all of the city's major attractions and places in just a few minutes walking distances. Wyndham Grand Athens hotel, with 276 exquisitely comfortable rooms and suites in 8 floors, offers a wide variety of brand new accommodations to suit single, couple or family needs for business or leisure travelers

facilities.facility_name: Children get free accommodation, meals payable on the spot

hotel_object.description: This family-owned hotel is located in the heart of Athens, at the foot of the Acropolis and beneath the Herodion theatre. The establishment is close to the old town district of Plaka offering various shopping and dining opportunities. The Acropolis underground station and tram stop lie within a few minutes of the hotel. Athens' beach is approximately 12 km away.  This air conditioned hotel comprises a total of 50 rooms including several suites. Facilities include a 24-hour reception desk, a bar and a restaurant. Further amenities include a conference room and a laundry service. The pleasant, bright rooms and suites afford a modern style that has been softened with elegant fabrics and ambient lighting. Each has been tastefully furnished and fully-equipped as standard.

This hotel is located in the heart of Athens. Numerous museums and galleries can be found in the surrounding area, and attractions such as the Plaka, the Syntagma Square with its boutique venues as well as world-famous monuments such as the Acropolis, the Parthenon or the Temple of the Olympian Zeus can be reached within a short stroll. Athens Airport is at 30 km from the property. The bright and airy rooms are excellently appointed and decorated in a cool minimalist style with vivid colours. They are soundproofed and features satellite-TV; many of them have a balcony. Guests can work out in the fitness centre or relax in the sauna and hammam. The rooftop terrace offers an outdoor pool and a lounge bar, boasting panoramic views over the city's skyline and the Acropolis.

This boutique property enjoys an enviable setting in the sophisticated area of Ekali. The hotel is set overlooking the forest and Parnitha Mountain, in a quiet, residential area. Guests will find themselves just a short distance away from a myriad of attractions in the area. This wonderful hotel comprises a truly striking design, exuding contemporary elegance. This glass building, comprises stunningly-designed accommodation options. The rooms and suites are superbly appointed, featuring advanced amenities for the utmost in comfort. This superb hotel's exemplary service, first-class facilities and peaceful, homely atmosphere sets it apart as a prime option for visitors to the area.

This hotel is located at the heart of the wonderful city of Athens. The hotel enjoys a prime setting, lying just a short distance away from many of the city's most prominent attractions. A wealth of shopping opportunities, dining options and entertainment venues are to be found nearby. Links to the public transport network are situated just a short distance from the hotel. This wonderful hotel is located just 8 km from the nearest golf course, while the international airport lies just 30 km away. This charming hotel enjoys a stunning design, blending effortlessly with its culturally-rich surroundings. The hotel offers a boundless array of exemplary facilities, meeting the needs of every type of traveller to a high level of excellence.

This hotel revels in its central location in Athens, just opposite to the Zeus Temple and Hadrian's Arch and within easy walking distance of the Plaka district and the Acropolis, as well as the Royal Palace. The National Museum, Syntagma Square, the National Gardens and the Old Town are also within an easy reach. Athens Airport is some 30 km away. This hotel enjoys an air of elegance and sophistication, beautifully blending contemporary and traditional elements. The guest rooms are superbly designed, featuring refreshing tones for a relaxing ambience. This hotel features a range of exemplary facilities, ensuring the utmost in comfort and convenience. Guests can keep working out at the gym with all modern equipment then pamper themselves at the spa with a relaxing atmosphere.

hotel_object.hotel: Brown Acropol a member of Brown Hotels
hotel_object.description:
Brown Acropol is a fully renovated design hotel, inspired by the cosmopolitan vibes of the 60s. The hotel's philosophy is based on a retro aesthetic, seasoned with a contemporary take on upscale leisure and lifestyle coolness. 
The hotel is situated in Omonia Square, the capital's commercial and business district, with direct access to the central metro station and within walking distance to some of Athens' iconic attractions. Famous Athenian locations and landmarks such as Syntagma, Ermou Street, the Acropolis and the Acropolis Museum can be found just a stone's throw away from the hotel premises, while many of the city's hip bars and restaurants are also conveniently close. With Athens International Airport ‚ÄúEleftherios Venizelos‚Äù and the Port of Piraeus, the main Athenian gateway to the Aegean islands, being only 40 and 30 minutes away respectively, transportation to and from Brown Acropol is delightfully easy.
The hotel features 165 high-end design rooms, with king size and twin beds and fully renovated luxurious bathrooms available. Within the air-conditioned rooms you may find a mini bar, a modern Vinyl music player and a complimentary Nespresso coffee machine, along with other luxurious amenities such as a trolley bar. 
Brown Acropol is the ideal place to organise your  business meetings, with conference facilities that can host up to 450 persons. At the main restaurant you may enjoy a rich breakfast buffet, while the Lobby bar offers a variety of spirits in an elegant and cozy area, by the iconic library of the Brown Hotels Collection. 
During the summer, the open-air rooftop bar-restaurant with breath-taking view to the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill is expected to evolve into your go-to place and one of the hottest meeting spots in the city! The hotel offers free WiFi in all areas, a 24h reception, concierge service, spa service (upon request).
For 2021, due to Covid19 Health Protocol Regulations, check in as from 15:00, check out up to 11:00 (local time).

rooms.name: Deluxe King or Twin Room with Balcony

hotel_object.description:
O&B Athens is a cozy 4 Stars Boutique Hotel, in the centre of Athens, a few steps from Ermou street, next to the main sites of the city and just 2 minutes walking from Thisio Metro Station.

With its Acropolis Suites with private terraces and view of the Parthenon, its elegant rooms and its O&B Athens All Day Bar Restaurant, O&B Athens Boutique Hotel welcomes you to Athens and invites you to experience its unique philosophy of hospitality and care.

In the old scenic streets of Athens centre, through the ruins of the Ancient Agora to the Acropolis, feeling everywhere the old ways of the city and through all the hustle and bustle, lays O&B Athens Boutique Hotel giving a new flavor and meaning to the urban lifestyle.
 
O&B Athens Boutique Hotel provokes you to experience a new level of hospitality in one of the most central hotels of Athens. Walking through the mature streets of downtown Athens and hearing the mist music, laughter, art and heart.

The mixture of stylish and suave design, the light strokes of class and elegance and the warm atmosphere of our O&B Athens hotel represent a new meaning of service, placing our guests in the limelight, with the aspiration to reach top quality for our guests experience.

Quiet hotel in Athens centre. The R√≠o Athens Hotel is located in a neoclassic building placed on a quiet pedestrian street from Athens. Fully restored, the hotel combines among its friendly rooms and facilities the modernity and the classic style. In order to guarantee the highest comfort for its guests, the rooms are equipped with air conditioning, private Bathroom, satellite TV, mini bar and direct telephone. The establishment is settled very close to the Metaxourghio metro stop, being well connected to the rest of the city. The hotel restaurant is the ideal place to have a rest enjoying Greek specialties, drinks and meals, as well, in a quiet atmosphere with pleasant music. For the clients looking for organize a business trips, the establishment also offers a large reunions hall.

facilities.facility_name: Children share the bed with parents

hotel_object.description: Located in the heart of Athens, adjacent to Omonia Square, this establishment is not far from the historic centre of the city. Links to the public transport network can be found just 10 minutes away, providing further convenience for those who wish to explore the area. The hotel comprises a total of 82 rooms, as well as a conference room with audio-visual equipment. The well-trained staff can also assist with the organisation of conferences. The rooms are tastefully decorated and offer every comfort for a good night's sleep. All units come with an en-suite bathroom, individually adjustable air conditioning and either a balcony or terrace.

The hotel Arethusa is a three star hotel, ideally located just next to Syntagma (Constitution) square and Plaka (old town of Athens) in Mitropoleos street, street of the Cathedral of Athens. The position of the hotel allows our customers easy access to the most important attractions of our city like Acropolis, Archeological museum, Cathedral, Town Hall, Temple of Zeus, Plaka and many more. It offers breakfast and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Simply yet tastefully decorated, all units come with a TV and fridge. Each includes a private bathroom with hairdryer and bath or shower. An American breakfast buffet is served in the dining area of the Hotel Arethusa or in the guests' rooms. Drinks and snacks are provided at the bar until late in the evening. The roof garden has seating areas where guests can admire panoramic views of the Acropolis and the city of Athens.

This hotel is located at the centre of Athens, just a stone's throw from the nearest underground station. Scores of shopping venues and restaurants are situated nearby, and it is just a short 20-minute walk to the historical district and the Acropolis. The airport is roughly 30 km away. Built in 1974 and completely renovated in 2004, this air-conditioned hotel offers cosy and comfortable rooms that are well-equipped with all modern in-room amenities for a pleasant stay. Each unit comes with TV, fridge, safe, work desk and en-suite bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries. There is a swimming pool with a poolside bar and restaurant located on the hotel's roof terrace. Guests arriving by car may use an open-air parking space, just opposite the hotel.

This hotel is quietly situated, somewhat out of the centre of Athens yet still within easy reach of all the important attractions. The hotel consists of 6 storeys and a total of 93 rooms, of which 12 are singles, 62 are doubles and 19 are suites. It offers guests a lobby with a 24-hour reception an air-conditioned √† la carte restaurant and a caf√©. In addition 1 meeting room, business centre and a bar are also available. Room and laundry services are available as well. Car park is provided with limited spaces upon availability.  The comfortable rooms include an en suite bathroom with hairdryer and complimentary toiletries. Each room come fully - equipped as standard to provide a feel at home atmosphere.  Buffet breakfast is served. Lunch and dinner √† la carte is also available.
During Summer time, enjoy an unforgettable island-like experience on our rooftop "Mavili Beach''. A Cycladic Heaven in a bustling city. In-house guests may enjoy the pool free of charge and upon availability.

facilities.facility_name: Green Key ‚Äì Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE)

hotel_object.description: Discover the ancient Greek capital during your stay at Novotel Athens. In summertime, enjoy the breathtaking views of the Acropolis and Lycabettus hill from our roof terrace. Relax with some food or a cocktail by the outdoor swimming pool. With monuments and museums nearby, you can fully experience Greek culture at Novotel Athens

Located in the heart of Athens, Greece, it is a newly renovated hotel offering an oasis of calm in the centre of the bustling city of Athens. The great location of The Stratos Vassilikos hotel allows easy access to major tourist attractions and business districts. The hotel offers guests a lobby with a 24-hour reception, a caf√©, an air-conditioned gourmet restaurant. Furthermore 5 conference rooms, a corner with tablets and a gym with a sauna are also available. The spacious and comfortable rooms offer an en-suite bathroom with hairdryer, and complimentary toiletries. Guests have the opportunity to relax in the hotel's sauna and steam room or to work out in the gym. A Greek buffet breakfast is served. Gourmet cuisine lunches and dinners are √† la carte.

facilities.facility_name: Green Key ‚Äì Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE)

hotel_object.description:
The pleasant city hotel enjoys a central location at the heart of Kipseli within 100 m of the nearest links to the public transport network. The surrounding area offers a diversity of shops and eateries including restaurants, taverns and cafes as well as many more entertainment venues (50 m - 500 m). It is also just 500 m to the nearest nightclub that offers a lively nightlife scene and the Greek Museum and National Archaeological Museum are also to be found in the near vicinity. The inviting local beach and turquoise-blue waters are to be found some 12 km away and may easily be reached either by car or by making use of the good-value public transport network.

The hotel comprises a total of 29 rooms spread over several floors. Amongst the facilities at this fully air-conditioned hotel count a foyer with a 24-hour reception desk, a safe, lifts and a caf√© in addition to a bar, a TV room, a breakfast room and a public Internet terminal. Room, laundry and medical services are also on offer.

The modern rooms each come with an en suite bathroom with a shower or bathtub, a hairdryer, a direct dial telephone, satellite/ cable TV, Internet access, a king-sized bed, carpeting, centrally controlled air conditioning, central heating and a hire safe.

Sports enthusiasts may forget their everyday stresses with a round of golf on the course that lies just 16 km away.

The comfortable and cosy Hotel Marina is ideally located in the Omonia area, the heart of Athens. Guests will appreciate the warm and friendly atmosphere of the family-run hotel. All of the major attractions of the Greek capital such as the archaeological sites including the world-famous Acropolis or the Tower of Winds, the old town Plaka, Syntagma Square and the commercial centre are within walking distance. Public transport connections are only a few steps away from the hotel, providing easy access to all areas of the city. A great place for guests who are looking for a central location.

Ideally situated in the heart of Athens, this city hotel is only an eight-minute walk from the fascinating National Archaeological Museum.¬†¬†Sightseers will definitely wish to see the Acropolis and explore the New Acropolis Museum, and might also visit the Temple of Olympian Zeus and Museum of Cycladic Art, all easily accessible as the nearest metro station is only a five-minute walk from the hotel.The functional, air-conditioned guest rooms come with private en suite bathrooms and satellite television, and guests can wake up to a delightful American breakfast buffet in the rooftop restaurant.¬†¬†The caf√© bar serves drinks and snacks that can also be enjoyed while checking email or catching up on current events in the internet corner.¬†¬†For a productive business trip or wonderful sightseeing holiday in Athens, this hotel's convenient location and comfortable rooms make it a great choice.

Just 100 metres from the nearest bus stop and within a short 10-minute walk from the Acropolis, this hotel is ideally situated in the centre of Athens. Athens International Airport is about 30 km from the property. After a day of sightseeing, vacationers will appreciate the air-conditioned comfort of the spacious suites. All of the elegantly furnished rooms have balconies, and some offer beautiful views of the city. Each room comes equipped with a satellite TV, minibar, tea and coffee facilities, safe and en-suite bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries.

The all new Athens Tiare Hotel is situated in the heart of Athens, the European City that never sleeps. Our newly renovated and redesigned guest rooms, suites, and public spaces feature bold accent colours, custom furnishings and state of the art technologies. Our experienced staff will offer you unmatched experiences and will fulfill your requests at any hour. Our executive chef Nikos Voulougouris together with our world awarded sommelier Nikos Giannopoulos will offer you a culinary experience you will not forget. Whether it is for business or pleasure, you will find that our high quality facilities will satisfy all your needs and even more. If you want to feel the pulse of the city, the Athens Tiare is the place to stay.

facilities.facility_name: Green Key ‚Äì Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE)

rooms.name: Double or Twin DELUXE CITY VIEW

hotel_object.description:
Inviting and welcoming, the Electra Athens, in the city's commercial district is the place to stay whether you are here for business or pleasure. Subtle and elegant and just off Syntagma square, our hotel rooms and suites are ideally located to host your city break or business trip without sacrificing the style and comfort you are used to.

Designed with the busy traveler of the 21st century in mind, and operated, as all Electra Hotels and Resorts are, under the philosophy of warm, heartfelt Greek hospitality, the Electra Athens features cozy rooms, supreme amenities and delicious breakfast and meals. In our well-appointed hotel rooms and suites, the comfortable beds, muted d√©cor and carefully chosen details create an atmosphere of soothing comfort, while in the breakfast restaurant and all day caf√©, tasty dishes complete the delightful experience.

If in town for business, you will find that the hotel's business facilities, natural lit conference hall, business services and staff make Electra ideal for your business stay ‚Äì plus, since it is so centrally located, you will be able to have some non-business downtime as well, enjoying the sights and vibrant Athenian scene.

Situated in the beginning of Ermou Street, the city's main shopping area, the Electra Athens hotel is conveniently located within walking distance from Plaka, Monastiraki and the Acropolis, as well as from the upscale district of Kolonaki with its wide choice of shopping and dining options. With the Athens metro just a few steps away, most of the city is within easy reach too, making the Electra Athens your perfect base for venturing about the city, doing business, discovering the Athenian treasures and enjoying your time in the capital of Greece.

Welcome to the center of Athens. Welcome to your ideal city center hotel. Welcome to Electra Athens.

The St George Lycabettus Hotel's prime location nestled against the pine-forested slopes of Lycabettus Hill affords breath-taking panoramic views over the city to the Acropolis and the Saronic Gulf beyond, yet also offers proximity to the pulsing heart of Athens, just steps away from Kolonaki's alluring shops, museums, galleries and eateries.The St George Lycabettus offers 154 contemporary bedrooms and suites, carefully designed for ultimate comfort and relaxation. Your best choice in hotel accommodation in Athens for your stay in the city.

The rooms and common areas of the Divani Caravel reflect a deep respect for the historic Athens, while providing all the comforts of a hotel of XXI century. A fashion fans love their location next to the boutiques of Kolonaki neighborhood elegance and nightlife par excellence of the city; meanwhile, art lovers will find themselves just a short walk away from the Museum of Cycladic Art and the National Gallery. All guests admire the views of the Plaza de la Constitution and the Acropolis from the roof of the hotel, with a great pool. For business travelers there are many options for meetings and events, including fully equipped function rooms sixteen, Olympia ballroom and banquet room overlooking Athens and specifically Lycabettus Hill and the Acropolis.

This hotel is located in the small coastal town of Lavrio just 10 km away from Cape Sounio, which offers a wealth of interesting areas to explore, such as the classical town hall built in 1864 and the indoor market or the ancient town of Thorikos with the oldest theatre in Greece. The hotel clings to a pine-clad hillside with panoramic views over this ancient monument. Behind it lies the Sounio National Park and below the hotel stretch two bays which can be reached via tunnels under the road. The Temple of Poseidon is just under 3 km away and the city of Athens lies around 61 km from the hotel. Athens Airport lies around 67 km from the hotel.

The buildings of this beach hotel are designed as an amphitheatre around the pool, allowing breathtaking views of the Temple of Poseidon and the sea from most guestrooms and public areas. This club resort comprises a total of 124 bungalows and offers guests a lobby area with a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe, a lift, a cafe, a hairdressing salon, a bar, a restaurant and conference facilities. Guests may also take advantage of the room service for an additional fee. There is also parking for those arriving by car.

The terracotta-coloured bungalows blend into the unspoiled landscape. All guestrooms feature a balcony/ terrace, a direct dial telephone, automatic wake-up calls, a minibar (for an extra charge), satellite TV, a DVD and CD player, a safe, individually adjustable air conditioning and heating and an electric shaver outlet. The private bathrooms come with a bathtub/shower and a hairdryer, Internet access and a king-size or double bed are also provided in all accommodation as standard.

facilities.facility_name: Green Key ‚Äì Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE)

hotel_object.description: The hotel is centrally located and is situated close to a number of sightseeing attractions, such as the Acropolis and the oldest quarter in Athens, Plaka. Public transport (Syngrou-Fix and Acropolis stations) are only minutes away. Built in 1974 and completely renovated in 2002, the hotel consists of 8 floors with a total of 84 rooms, of which 6 are singles, 75 are doubles and 3 are suites. Facilities on offer include an entrance hall with 24-hour reception, a hotel safe and a currency exchange service. In addition the hotel includes a caf√©, a bar, an air-conditioned √† la carte restaurant with a separate non-smoking area, a conference room and Internet access. The stylish and comfortable rooms come with an en suite bathroom with hairdryer. They are all fully - equipped as standard.  The hotel prides itself on its sauna, steam room, massage services and gym.

This comfortable city hotel enjoys a fabulous location in the heart of Athens, right under the cliffs of the Acropolis, in one of the most significant archaeological sites in the world. The Acropolis museum and metro station are just a two-minute walk from the hotel, and visitors will enjoy easy access to all this celebrated city has to offer, from restaurants and shops to fascinating museums and stunning architecture ranging from ancient to modern day.

The hotel's air-conditioned rooms are cosy and contemporary with free Wi-Fi and in-room coffee and tea facilities. Guests can start the day with a delicious Greek breakfast buffet, and sample authentic Greek dishes in the restaurant. The hotel also provides a conference centre for business events, banquets and conferences, making this the ideal base from which to explore this ancient city whether travelling for business or leisure.

facilities.facility_name: Green Key ‚Äì Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE)

hotel_object.description: The ideal location of the hotel enables guests to easily reach the archaeological sites, historical buildings, museums and cathedrals. The beach is around 200 m away and there is a bus stop just 100 m from the establishment. Glyfada Square, with its modern shopping venues and lively taverns, is within walking distance of the property. The hotel offers a choice of luxurious, modern and spacious rooms with inviting balconies, from which guests have a view of either the Saronic Gulf or of the mountains. They are comfortably furnished and make for a pleasant and calm stay. All come with double-glazed windows and feature high speed Internet access and a writing desk.

rooms.name: Double or Twin SUPERIOR CITY VIEW
Double or Twin SUPERIOR SIDE SEA VIEW

hotel_object.description: Enjoying a privileged situation in the heart of Athens, right in the centre of a commercial district of the Greek capital, this wonderful contemporary hotel is a perfect base for a business travel, romantic gateway or a city break. The ancient Acropolis of Athens and the imposing Metropolitan Cathedral are within a short stroll away and at the property's doorstep guests may find numerous means of public transport including metro, tram and bus stops This elegant urban establishment boasts charming d√©cor and welcoming atmosphere. Guests may retire to their modern and tastefully appointed rooms, where soundproofed windows and comfortable beds guarantee a good night's sleep. Every morning guests may wake up to delicious breakfast.  Patrons may also enjoy a drink from the bar and inquire with the friendly staff at the 24-hour reception for recommendations on the best places to visit in this impressive city.

This beach hotel is located in Glyfada, right at the Olympic docks for the 2004 games. Shopping amenities and nightlife venues are to be found extremely close by. There is a link to the public transport in a 5-minute walk.This hotel comprises a restaurant, a bar and a conference room for up to 70 people. Guests can also hire a limousine if they wish.The rooms are spacious and finely furnished. They each come with an en suite bathroom and a balcony with a view of the Saronic Gulf. All rooms are well-equipped as standard.There is a swimming pool available to guests where they can treat themselves to a cocktail at the poolside bar. There are various leisure options as well as a golf course just 1 km away.The hotel also has a main bar, with a holiday atmosphere and friendly barkeepers, in which guests can enjoy a wide range of drinks. The bar is open 24 hours every day.

facilities.facility_name: Green Key ‚Äì Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE)

rooms.name: Double or Twin EXECUTIVE SEA VIEW

hotel_object.description: The hotel is located in the area of Alimos, and is approximately 25 km from the airport. Public transport is easily accessible, and the express bus line E-96 runs 24 hours a day and connects the hotel with Port Piraeus via Possidonos Avenue. This beach property features a lobby with 24-hour reception, an Internet caf√© and a car park. Several categories of rooms are available to ensure comfort for any type of travel. All offer functionality in superb surroundings, and feature an en-suite bathroom with hairdryer, satellite TV and soundproof windows. Individually adjustable air conditioning and a balcony with a sea view, also feature as standard.

This elegant luxury hotel is ideally situated just 100 metres from the coast. The lively city centre, with a variety of sightseeing attractions as well as an abundance of shops and other entertainment venues, is within easy walking distance or may be reached on public transport. The hotel was built in 1980 and completely renovated in 2004. There are a total of 35 rooms spread over 4 floors, of which 30 are double rooms and 5 are suites. The hotel's sizeable lobby contains lifts, hotel safes, a currency exchange desk and a 24-hour reception. In addition, there is a TV room, a hairdressers, a nightclub, a caf√© and an air-conditioned √† la carte restaurant with a separate non-smoking area. The impeccable en suite rooms are fully - equipped. They also include a kitchenette, a minibar, a lounge area and a safe as standard. The nearest golf course is located about 5.5 km from the hotel.

rooms.name: Double or Twin SUPERIOR GARDEN VIEW
Double or Twin DELUXE GARDEN VIEW
Double or Twin DELUXE SEA VIEW

hotel_object.description: Athens Poseidon Hotel provides the ultimate destination for holidays in the Greek capital. Away from the hustle and bustle of the city center and with incomparable connectivity to all the major sights and attractions in Athens, our hotel boasts a privileged location and can serve the needs of families, couples and parties of friends, adventurers and business people from all over the world. Even on a tight schedule, you may explore Athens to the fullest with the help of the specific location of Athens Poseidon Hotel and thanks to the superb access to all means of transportation. Just a breath away, there is the Tram and a bus station for you to hop on and start discovering the hidden gems of Athens. Greek hospitality is praised in Athens Poseidon Hotel, with fully personalized services that are tailor made to meet your needs and desires. Our team of professionals will make the most out of your stay, providing suggestions as to the places you ought to visit and the things you should do, always serving you with a smile. Our facilities and services will allow you to relax and enjoy every moment of your stay at our hotel. The modern d√©cor of our interior, the wonderful bar and restaurants on offer, the great value for money and the attention to the slightest detail will delight you and introduce you to the true meaning of holidays in Athens. Be it summer or winter, spring or autumn, Athens Poseidon Hotel provides great accommodation while visiting Athens and wishing to take advantage of every last second of your journey here!

The hotel is situated 20 minutes from the centre of Athens, close to Karaiskaki square, where there is the bus station terminal offering connection to the international airport and Piraeus underground station from which Kifissia can be reached.

This family-run city hotel, which has 25 rooms in total, offers standard accommodation simply decorated and with modern comfort in mind. There is a breakfast room, a bar with a friendly atmosphere and a TV at the comfortable hotel's lounge. It is air-conditioned and has a lobby with 24-hour reception, currency exchange facility and lift access.

The rooms come with shower, direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, radio and individually adjustable air conditioning.

This city hotel is a modern property some 300 m from the port in Piraeus and 8 km from Athens and the Acropolis. The hotel, which has 30 rooms in total, has a lobby with 24-hour reception, currency exchange facility and lift access. Facilities include a bar and limited dining facilities (breakfast room). Also the hotel offers a TV room. Guestrooms are air-conditioned and feature a simple white decor with brightly-coloured fabrics, prints on the walls and dark wood furniture. All rooms have a private shower, balcony offering a view of the street, direct dial phone and a TV. Guests can order drinks and snacks in the informal mezzanine setting of the lounge bar, with its warm decor and dark wood furnishings.

This city and business hotel lies very close to the Acropolis and the Plaka area, the old city of Athens. The establishment is within 2 km of the Greek Parliament and the centre of Athens. It is just 4 km from the nearest beach. The local airport is about 192 km away. Completely renovated in August 2004, the establishment offers traditional Greek hospitality in combination with international standards of quality. The 6-storey building comprises a total of 91 guest rooms and suites. Guests are welcomed into a lobby with a 24-hour reception and check-out service. Facilities on offer include a bar, a restaurant, conference facilities and WLAN Internet access. The hotel rooms provide an elegant and colourful environment. All rooms are fully-equipped as standard including a flat screen TV, air conditioning and a private bar/mini fridge.

This upscale hotel is located close to the beach in the mesmerising city of Athens. The hotel is situated in one of the most exclusive shopping, leisure and commercial districts of the city. Guests will find themselves within easy access of a host of attractions, as well as shopping opportunities, dining options and entertainment venues. Appealing to discerning business and leisure travellers alike, this hotel is sure to impress. The hotel enjoys a charming architectural design, welcoming guests with warm hospitality and excellent service. The guest rooms are beautifully appointed, and are well equipped with modern amenities. The hotel features a sprawling garden, where guests can simply relax and unwind. Guests will appreacite the range of facilities that the hotel has to offer.

This is an elegant boutique hotel ideally situated as a perfect base from which to explore the city. There is a wide range of restaurants, bars, caf√©s, shopping streets and entertainment venues in the area. The hotel is within walking distance of the National Theatre, the Archaeological Museum, the Acropolis, and the ancient area of Plaka. Facilities on offer include a lobby with 24-hour reception, currency exchange, a caf√©,  a restaurant, and Internet access. For an additional fee, guests may use the room and laundry services.

This charming mid-sized property is located very close to the metro station at Platia Victoria and within walking distance of the National Archaeological Museum. It is a good choice for travellers from all over the world who seek high design and quality standards in their accommodation, as well as top quality service. On the premises of the venue they will find the perfect conditions for an unforgeable stay in the capital city of Greece. They can start their days with the healthy breakfast and finish them with a glass of wine at the onsite bar, before heading to the beautifully-appointed rooms. If they are wondering what to do in between, then they can hop on the sight-seeing public bus line that departs from the nearby museum and visit any of the 16 attractions that make the city such a popular tourist destination.

Periscope is the YES!Hotels antidote to the ordinary city hotel. Modern minimalism and award-winning architectural design create a Young, Enthusiastic and Seductive urban haven, right at the heart of Kolonaki, the oldest and most exclusive neighborhood in Athens. The original mundane building, dating from the 1950s, is now a tribute to clean lines and uncluttered spaces, balancing ergonomic solutions with urban aesthetics. Form, color, and texture create a feeling of order and tranquility. Periscope's 21 guestrooms and public spaces boast specially commissioned art on the theme of a periscope observing and recording the buzzing metropolis. A modern "home" for the long weekend or for the short break, Periscope is a firm favorite among business and leisure travelers. Now, guests can enjoy all day complimentary fruits, snacks and beverages in the brand new lounge.

facilities.facility_name: Green Key ‚Äì Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE)

hotel_object.description:
This hotel is located in the heart of old Athens, opposite the Acropolis and just metres from Thissio, the ancient agora and the forum. It is set on the pedestrian street of Apostolou Pavlou, an ideal base from which to explore the city and all of its great monuments. Thisseion urban train station is 50 metres from the hotel.

Guests can enjoy all the standard facilities of a city hotel. With simple and functional accommodation, the hotel provides guests with a pleasant base from which get to know Athens. Easily accessible and air-conditioned throughout, it offers an entrance hall with a 24-hour reception and check-out service, lift access, a restaurant and bar and 15 spacious guest rooms. For an additional fee guests can make use of the WLAN Internet access and room and laundry services.

Each room comes with an en-suite bathroom, a hairdryer, a direct dial telephone, a satellite television, Internet access, air conditioning, central heating and a balcony or terrace.

Breakfast is served in the form of a buffet.

This hotel enjoys a prime setting in Athens. The hotel lies within a short distance of a myriad of attractions, including Athens Olympic Stadium, Kavoutsakis Art Institute, Goulandris National History Museum and Mall Athens. The hotel welcomes guests with a modern architectural design, and the promise of comfort and relaxation. The guest rooms are elegantly appointed, exuding charm and poise. The rooms come complete with modern amenities, and provide a peaceful space in which to relax and unwind. The hotel affords guests a number of facilities, catering to the needs of every type of traveller. Guests will be thoroughly impressed by this hotel, as well as its endearing surroundings.

The hotel is located at the heart of the historical part of Athens city and the picturesque neighbourhood of Plaka. It is right next to Monastiraki Square and the metro station that will ease your transportation to and from the airport and Piraeus port . Alimos beach is around 4 km away and Piraeus beach is roughly 7 km away. This establishment offers a total of 35 rooms, all elegantly furnished in a cosy atmosphere. The hotel is air-conditioned and features an all-day bar and restaurant with magnificent views of the Acropolis and Monastiraki Square. Guests are welcomed in the lobby, which offers a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe and currency exchange facilities. Further amenities include a TV room, laundry and room services. The accommodation units have a unique style with a family atmosphere. All rooms are fully-equipped as standard and feature wooden floors, as well as high-quality and modern furnishings.

The Hotel occupies a beautifully renovated neo-classical building in the heart of old Athens,close to the Ancient Market and the New City Market.The picturesque neighborhoods of Plaka,Psirri,Acropolis and the Parliament are very close.The hotel offers easy walking access to restaurants and nightclubs offering all forms of daytime and evening entertaintment.
It is 2 min from Momastiraki metro station and only 45min from the airport and 25min from Pireaus port 
Its place,services and its magnificent view from the roof terrace,makes it an ideal residence for businness and leisure travelers.

This hotel lies close to the bustling, culturally-rich centre of Athens. The hotel is set on Patisson Street, enjoying close proximity to links to the public transport network. The city's many intriguing sights can be found nearby, including the National Archaeological Museum and the Acropolis, which are within 3 km of the hotel. Eleftherios Venizelos International Airport is just 27 km away. This wonderful hotel is perfect for every type of traveller. The guest rooms come complete with modern amenities, ensuring comfort and convenience. Guests can avail of the hotel's many facilities and services, which add to their experience at the hotel.

This family-run hotel is situated in a quiet street behind the national Archaeological Museum in the centre of Athens, only 4 minutes walking to the central Omonia Square and within walking distance to the Acropolis. The nearest metro station is only 500 m away. The hotel offers 50 rooms, 24-hour reception, room service, express check-in and check-out, concierge service, library, meeting room, playroom, lounge-tv, safe box, free WIFI, breakfast, restaurant, bar, terrace, tourist ticket service, laundry service (chargeable), medical assistance, bicycle rental and car hire.

This hotel is located in the commercial centre of Athens, just a 1-minute walk from Omonia central station. It lies 1 km from the National Archaeological Museum, 1.3 km from Monastiraki, 1.6 km from Plaka, 2.1 km from the Acropolis/Parthenon and 2.3 km from the New Acropolis Museum. Piraeus beach is 10 km away and it is 25 km to Alimos and its beach and 32 km to Athens International Airport.

Renovated in 2021, this city design hotel has been carefully and tastefully decorated, offering a pleasant, clean and inviting atmosphere. It comprises a total of 51 rooms over 9 floors. Facilities on offer to guests at this air-conditioned establishment include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception and check-out service, a hotel safe and lift access. There is a cafe, a 24-hour bar and a large breakfast room where a traditional continental breakfast is served. Guests will appreciate the wireless Internet access.

The rooms are simply decorated and come with a private bathroom with a shower. They offer a queen-size bed and are equipped with a direct dial telephone, a TV, a desk and free high-speed wireless Internet access. Furthermore, individually regulated air conditioning and heating are provided in all accommodation as standard. All rooms also feature either a balcony or a terrace.

Guests are served breakfast each morning.

Guests arriving from Athens International Airport by metro will need around 70 minutes to get to the hotel. They should take line 3 towards Egaleo, change at Syntagma station to line 2 towards Agios Antonios and get off at Omonia station, then walk down Pireos street. It is also possible to reach the hotel by bus X95, getting out at Syntagma terminal station, then taking metro line 2 towards Agios Antonios and getting off at Omonia station. From the Port of Piraeus, guests can get to the hotel by train. They should take line 1 from Piraeus, get off at Omonia station and then walk along Pireos street.

This modern aparthotel is located in the quiet suburb of Marousi, very close to the 2004 Olympics Stadium. One of the biggest shopping centres in the country - The Mall and the HELEXPO Palace exhibition centre, are both within a 15-minute walk and the surrounding area has been transformed into one of Attica's major business centres and some of the biggest corporate groups have moved their headquarters to the region. Links to the public transport network are available within 300 metres. The venue itself consists of modernly decorated, spacious and bright units with king-size beds and large balconies. During the summer period, the outdoor swimming pool offers a new way for guests to relax or exercise, in addition they can also sip a refreshing coffee or a colourful cocktail while they stretch on the sun loungers next to it.

Our restaurant will be opened from 07:00 ‚Äì 22:00
*Last order for food and drink 21:30

Situated in a prime setting at the heart of the mesmerising city of Athens, this hotel is located in close proximity to the National Museum and Plaka Square. The hotel offers guests a great location from which to explore the delights that this captivating city has to offer, as well as a boundless array of shopping opportunities, dining options and entertainment venues. The hotel is located within easy access of the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. Bathed in the rich culture and history of the city, this charming hotel embodies the elegance and style of a bygone era. Guests are welcomed into a world where tradition and modernity enjoy a happy union. The guest rooms are sumptuously appointed, commanding impressive views over the city streets. Guests are invited to take advantage of the facilities that the hotel has to offer.

This hotel offers the perfect blend of historic Neoclassical charm and modern day luxury, an ideal contemporary elegant suburban sanctuary where a warm welcome is a tradition. Guests will be greeted in a warm and comfortable lobby which offers non-stop reception and check-out service and is decorated with flowers, elegant handcrafted wooden furniture and original artwork. Comprising of only 12 guest accommodations, the air-conditioned property can provide a unique level of personalized services. Guests can indulge in the taste for the finer things in the suite, distinguished by generous space and classical style and decorated in warm earth tones. The sleeping quarters are secluded from the living and working areas, ensuring privacy during informal meetings or while relaxing. Guests can enjoy a rich breakfast or a delicious Mediterranean cuisine in the brasserie by the swimming pool.

Located in the affluent and leafy suburb of Kifissia, the hotel is in the heart of evolving Athens, surrounded by high-end boutiques, restaurants, and cafes. Set 340 m above sea level, the hotel offers an oasis from the humidity of central Athens.

This is an intimate hotel that focuses on positive energy, heightened experiences, culture, art, and design. It is a place for new contemporary experiences, to enjoy, work, and relax in a truly memorable way. The 52-room hotel, designed by Karim Rashid, is Athens's design-inspired hotel, offering a new intimate alternative to modern travellers. The air-conditioned establishment welcomes guests in a lobby with 24-reception and lift access. Other on-site amenities include a bar, restaurant and conference facilities, while for an extra fee, guests can also take advantage of WLAN Internet access, room service, a laundry service and the hotel car park.

Visiting guests have the chance to experience a 21st-century creation: from the curve in a desk to the light-box installation behind the beds, the hotel combines art with bricks and mortar. Comfort and functionality rank high in the design brief and the hotel will offer the complete gamut of services. Each of the rooms features a private en suite bathroom with a bathtub. Guests can look forward to a great nights' sleep in cosy double and king-size beds and enjoy the in-room amenities, which include a direct dial telephone, TV, Internet access, safety deposit box and either a balcony or terrace.

The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers and parasols. For an extra fee guests can also work out or simply indulge their senses with one of a range of spa treatments.

facilities.facility_name: Green Key ‚Äì Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE)

hotel_object.description:
This hotel is located just minutes away from all the excitement of Athens, very close to the National Archaeological Museum, the ancient market and the National Theatre. It lies minutes from the Acropolis (2 km), Ancient Agora (2 km) and the new Acropolis Museum. It is centrally located only blocks away from the shopping and commercial districts of Kolonaki Square and Ermou Street.

Renovated in 2010, this is a modern city hotel housed in an urban design building and offering quality services. It comprises a total of 8 single rooms and 23 double/twin rooms spread over 6 floors. Facilities on offer to guests include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception and check-out service and lift access. There is a bar and a breakfast room and guests will also appreciate the free Internet access.

The accommodation comes with a shower and 2 single beds. The rooms are equipped with a direct dial telephone, a TV, a radio, a desk and free high-speed wireless Internet access. Furthermore, individually regulated air conditioning and heating are provided in all accommodation as standard and all rooms feature either a balcony or a terrace.

Guests are served a continental breakfast each morning.

Located at the heart of Athens, this hotel is within walking distance from the most attractive tourist sites such as the National Archaeological Museum, the Acropolis Museum, the Parthenon and the lively district of Monastiraki. Eleftherios Venizelos International airport is easily reachable by public transport. Situated a few minutes away from Omonoia Square, Keramikos metro station and the Conference centres of Stoa Vivliou and Technopolis, this hotel is perfect for both business and leisure travellers.
The hotel offers fully equipped and spacious rooms, decorated in a contemporary style. A breakfast buffet is served every morning at the hotel's restaurant, where guests will be able to taste Greek homemade specialties as well as International dishes also for lunch and dinner. The hotel offers a breakfast basket so guests can take it on their excursions.

This aparthotel enjoys an enviable setting in the captivating city of Athens. The aparthotel is situated just a short distance away from the Athens National Gallery, offering guests the ideal setting from which to explore the delights that this mesmerising city has to offer. Guests can enjoy ease of access to the stunning historical district of Plaka. This wonderful aparthotel is bathed in the rich culture and tradition of Greece. The complex comprises beautifully-decorated guest rooms and apartments, providing a relaxing home away from home. The accommodation options come complete with modern amenities for guests' comfort and convenience. This delightful hotel offers exemplary facilities and services.

Conveniently located just a few minutes' walks from the Acropolis and the New Acropolis Museum, Acropolis Ami Boutique Hotel offers a rooftop terrace with an imposing view of the Acropolis and the Parthenon. Fully renovated in a classical style, this hotel is situated in a peaceful and safe area of Athens center and is very well connected with all the areas of the city by all public transportation (metro, tram and bus), also with the airport and the port. Many of the city's major attractions are within walking distance including monuments such as Hadrian's Arc, The Temple of Olympian Zeus, Panathinaikon Stadium, and picturesque neighborhoods such as Plaka, Monastiraki, Syntagma Square and Psirri where you will discover a variety of boutiques, bars restaurants and shopping areas. Combining stylish and classic decor, all rooms are equipped with air-conditioning, small refrigerator, free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, ecological mattresses while some rooms have a stunning view of the Acropolis from their balcony. Don't miss to enjoy the rich buffet breakfast with special selections of delicious homemade products. Our 24-hour front desk staff will be happy to assist guests with tourist information and suggestions for exploring this historical city of Athens. We also provide our guests with free city maps, luggage storage, and information and assistance about excursions outside Athens.

This charming city hotel is situated in the centre of Athens in a quiet district on Syngrou Avenue, just behind the historic Agios Sostis Church. The business hotel is just 3 km, or a 10-minute ride on public transport, from the town centre and places of interest, such as the Acropolis, Plaka, Philopappos Monument and the New Acropolis Museum. There is a bus station just 100 m from the conference hotel, while the nearest metro station lies just 1.2 km away. The beautifully appointed and well-equipped rooms offer a haven of peace and tranquillity in which to totally loosen up at the end of the day. Visitors may energize their day with delectable breakfast served at the enchanting hotel restaurant. Corporate travellers may avail for the versatile business centre and meeting rooms, ideal to host a conference or a special event. There is also a snug hotel bar where guests may enjoy a drink and while away in a carefree atmosphere.

Overlooking the famous Kefalari Park and Kefalari Square, and within easy reach of every notable business, entertainment and cultural attraction in the exclusive Athenian suburb, this hotel welcomes its guests at an excellent location. Characterised by elegant simplicity and old-world charm the Neoclassical architecture and decoration of the venue will prepare guests to be treat to all the grandeur and beauty ones can expect. They can start their day in the beautiful area by the swimming pool, where the hotel's private health club and sauna resides. State of the art equipment and experienced staff will ensure to their total relaxation and rejuvenation. Afterwards they can enjoy a friendly match at the tennis court or workout in the fitness centre. For dining the excellent restaurant can treat them to delicious Greek and Italian specialities, all carefully prepared by the Master Chefs.

Relax in the Brand New Spa at Theoxenia Palace with indoor heated Swimming Pool, Sauna, hot tub Whirlpool and Hammam open daily 14:00 ‚Äì 21:00 at extra charge EUR 25 per person / day. Available for adults and children over 16 years old.

Ideally located in the heart of Athens and within walking distance to main of the city's main attractions, the Acropolis Select Hotel is the perfect place to stay during your next visit to Greece's capital. 
 
 A short stroll from the hotel places guests at the ancient site of the Acropolis, the New Acropolis Museum and the Plaka District while other major landmarks such as Syntagma Square, the Temple of Olympian Zeus and the Flee Market as well as the city's shopping hotspots are within easy reach. 
 
 The property is a stone's throw away from metro, tram and bus stations, making traveling around the city and its beach suburbs very convenient.
 
 This 72 room hotel has recently undergone renovation, fitted with elegant Italian design furniture, fine German fabrics and original pieces of art inspired from ancient Greece, which add to its modern, stylish d√©cor and welcoming ambience. American buffet breakfast is served daily and there is free Wi-Fi access (VDSL) in all public areas. The on-site rooftop restaurant, 180 West, serves snacks and Mediterranean cuisine and offers Acropolis views.
 
IMPORTANT NOTICE:
According to Covid-19 safety protocols, visitors are not allowed in the rooms.
IMPORTANT NOTICE:
According to the latest Covid-19 protocols, all residents upon check in must have either a vaccination certificate, either a recovery certificate or a negative test (PCR or RAPID). Children from 4 years old up to 17 years old must have a negative test (self or rapid)

This city design hotel is housed in a classical 19th century building and combines the atmosphere of the period with the technology of the 21st century. The beautiful rooms offer the perfect blend of functionality, comfort and modern design features, where guests will be able to relax and enjoy their times. Its location in the cultural and commercial centre of the city places them in the middle of all the fun and excitement. They will be just 100 m from the Omonia metro station that offers links to every point of the city, including the Athens International Airport and Piraeus port. On foot guests will be able to explore the ancient Acropolis and Plaka, visit the famous Syntagma Square and Monastiraki, and finish their trip by browsing the boutiques on Ermou Street and grabbing a bite at the restaurants located around Kolonaki Square.

The family-friendly hotel is nestled at the foot of the Acropolis hill, just a few steps away from the Parthenon, the Temple of Zeus, Hadrian Arch and other monuments of Ancient Greek civilisation. Sitting in the very heart of the city's historic centre allow its guests to reach the Constitution Square, the Greek Parliament, Athens stock market and Athens' exclusive shopping areas of Ermou and Kolonaki within a short walk. Guests who want to explore the rest of the city can find the nearest metro station just 400 metres away, while those who are looking for something off the beaten path can visit the nearby Monastiraki flea market. The hotel is housed in a classical building that dates back to 1928 and which has undergone complete renovation in order to turn it into a modern and comfortable establishment.

This charming hotel sits right in the centre of Piraeus, with its beautiful port, promenade and the University just a 5-minute walk away. It is perfectly connected with the rest of the city and the Airport thanks to the bus and metro station that sits just 200 metres from it. The hotel itself is one of the new landmark buildings that inhabit the prestigious block of the business district of Greece's biggest port. Its unique architecture combines elements of the neoclassical style with modern building design in order to create a delightful mix of classical worldly charm and comfortable modernity. It is a great place for all executive travellers due to its excellent conference and business facilities. After a day of meetings they can head to the relaxed onsite bar for a pleasant chat and a chilled drink.

This hotel is situated on Omonia Square in the very centre of Athens.  Omonia metro station is only a stone's throw away, providing easy access to all parts of the city, and many famous sights are within walking distance, including the Parthenon, the National Gardens and the Museum of Greek Folk Art.  The central train station is a 15-minute stroll from the hotel, while the airport is 30 km away. The hotel offers 24-hour reception,  and a meeting room for added convenience, and guests might make use of free WIFI and dine in the restaurant and bar, all during a productive business trip or exciting sightseeing holiday.

Thank you for choosing our Ramada hotel. Ramada is a global upper midscale hotel brand with over 820 properties located in over 50 countries worldwide. Most Ramada hotels feature free wired and wireless high-speed internet access, meeting rooms, business services, fitness facilities and upgraded bath amenities. Many properties have an on-site restaurant, lounge, while other sites offer a complimentary continental breakfast. You do your thing, leave the rest to us.

This modern hotel enjoys a great location in Athens. The hotel is located within easy access of a host of attractions in this mesmerising city. Guests will find themselves in the ideal setting from which to experience the essence of this captivating city. The hotel enjoys a style rich in traditional charm, yet has perfectly blended it with contemporary design. The interior is tastefully appointed, exuding an air of peace and serenity, seemingly miles away from the bustle which lies just outside. Visitors will appreciate the spacious, warm guest rooms, which offer a relaxing setting in which to unwind in comfort at the end of the day. The rooms feature modern amenities for guests' convenience. The hotel offers excellent facilities, meeting the needs of every type of traveller.

This outstanding hotel can be found in Athens coast. The hotel consists of 47 rooms. This establishment was lastly renovated in 2019. Guests will not be bothered during their stay, as this is not a pet-friendly establishment. Glyfada Riviera Hotel is located on the Athenian Riviera, close to the beach and within walking distance of the Glyfada Golf Course. Guests can enjoy a swim in the outdoor pool, while free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Rooms have a fresh d√©cor with light-wood furnishings and earthy tones. Comfortable rooms are complete with air conditioning and satellite TVs. A buffet breakfast is served daily. A restaurant and bar are available on site. In-room dining is provided through room service, from 7 in the morning until midnight. The 24-hour reception staff can assist you with car rental, excursions and city information. A nearby bus stop provides easy access to Athens city centre, 18 km away, or the International Airport, 25 km away.

This hotel is located just 5 minutes from Piraeus port, one of the biggest in Europe. This family-friendly city property is a stylish modern hotel which features beautiful paintings and sculptures in its interiors. It comprises a total of 56 rooms. Facilities on offer to guests at this air-conditioned establishment include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception and check-out service, a bar and a restaurant. Garage parking is available on site for those arriving by car.¬†¬†All rooms are fully renovated and come with a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. They are equipped with Internet access, a TV and a fridge. Furthermore, individually regulated air conditioning and central heating are provided in all accommodation as standard. The ¬†rooms also feature either a balcony ,a veranda ¬†or a window .¬†¬†A delicious continental breakfast is served, as well as a lunch menu.

In a beautiful ‚Äúvilla‚Äù type hotel open around the year, in the suburbs of Athens located in ‚ÄúMati‚Äù area we intend for every guest to feel as if you are visiting a friend's house. You will relax by the pool or by the fire place and enjoy a refreshing drink or a homemade meal and you will be pampered and well taken care of. The hotel close to the Athens airport (only 20 min ride) but not so close to be awaken by the planes, in a beautiful blossomed garden in the countryside but with a Bus Stop just outside our door if you choose to visit Athens an. The hotel offer guest all free services to make guest's life easier like Free Wi-Fi, Free Computer usage and we will even print Boarding Passes for Free if guest travelling by plane to save you time and money. In addition the hotel has an exclusive cooperation with luxurious taxis that will transfer guest to and from the Athens Airport at the best available price.

This hotel is located at the centre of Piraeus next to Terpsitheas Square Gardens. It lies in a business area, very close to the main port of Piraeus and to the commercial area. The hotel is also very close to Pasalimani harbour (300 m), which is full of restaurants and caf√©s. Piraeus' archaeological museum is just 300 m from the hotel and Marina Zeas, with its bars and pubs, is 500 m away, as is the Nautical Museum of Piraeus. Within walking distance of the hotel guests will find a bus stop, train station and museums. It is 2.5 km to Votsalakia Beach and 7 km to Mikrolimano. Athens Airport is 40 km away.

This city hotel features a warm and friendly atmosphere. It comprises a total of 80 rooms spread over 8 floors and is ideal for business travellers and holidaymakers alike. Facilities on offer to guests at this air-conditioned establishment include a lobby with a 24-hour reception and check-out service, a hotel safe, a currency exchange facility and lift access. There is a TV lounge, a caf√© and a restaurant and the hotel's well equipped conference room is suitable for business seminars up to 150 individuals. Guests can take advantage of the WLAN Internet access point and room service is available for an extra charge. Visitors have a laundry service at their disposal and there is parking available (charges apply) for those arriving by car.

Each room features a unique colour scheme which plays out in the fabrics and paintings on the walls to create a warm and cosy environment for guests' stay. All guest rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer and offer a double bed. They are equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, a radio and Internet access. There is a minibar/fridge, tea and coffee making facilities (charges apply) and an ironing set. Furthermore, individually regulated air conditioning and heating are provided in all accommodation as standard and all rooms feature either a balcony or a terrace.

This hotel is situated close to Monastiraki and to the Acropolis, and the area of Keramikos. Omonia station is within a few minutes' walk and offers guests easy access to the city.  This hotel is the old Athenian Inn hotel in Kolonaki, and after 30 years of successful operation, it has been relocated to the historical centre of Athens. This hotel is the ideal place for a pleasant and relaxing stay. All rooms are soundproofed and come with a private bathroom and modern furnishing to meet guests' requirements for absolute comfort and perfect style. The rooms on the 7th floor also feature large, individual balconies and enjoy views of the Acropolis and the Lycabettus (limited availability). The rooms are also equipped with a direct dial telephone and a TV and non-smoking rooms are available on request.

This city-hotel is located in the historical triangle of Athens, only 50 m from Syntagma Square and close to all the main sights and monuments of the city. Just a short stroll around the area will take its guests to the Parliament, Plaka and the Temple of Olympian Zeus or the business centre. Restaurants, bars, links to public transport, the bus and train stations, an underground station and shopping opportunities can all be found in the vicinity. This is the place for everyone who had dreamt of waking up to the magnificent view of the ancient Acropolis Hill. For an even better vista of the hill and the city skyline its guests can head to the top-floor Bella Vista restaurant, where they can dine on delicious Greek and international dishes, sip on some outstanding wine and enjoy its refined atmosphere and pleasant airiness.

rooms.name: Double or Twin SUPERIOR CITY VIEW

hotel_object.description: This luxurious hotel boasts a great location right in Athens' city centre, within easy reach from the main sightseeing attractions in the city. The property is a mere 100 metres from the Parliament and Syntagma square, and also just a few steps from world-renowned monuments and buildings such as the Acropolis, the Parthenon or Dionisus Theatre. Moreover, in the surrounding area, visitors will find plenty of public transport links, allowing them to easily visit other parts of the city. Every elegantly appointed guest room and suite boasts a unique and individual style and is equipped with upgraded amenities to ensure a memorable stay in the City of Gods. Some of the best accommodation units have a private terrace overlooking the Acropolis and a wonderful hot tub to truly relax and find balance between body and soul. Among the great array of services, guests will find a business centre.
